topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556bf31c6368727a46890e00#post_556bf31c6368727a46890e00

Alright now read this carefuly. No one is going to know what happened unless you decide to all but scream it with your body language.

Yes, you skipped a light, there's plenty who just see green and ignore the other colors.

No one was harmed and it was justa scare, just that. They're not calling the cops on you and sure as hell ain't tracking the car either.

Take a deep breath and distract your mind from this.
